headline.main: Beauty; THE YEAR OF THE NUTRITIONIST

docs.abstract: Article on increasing number of people who are consulting nutritionists in effort to improve their dietary habits; Drs Richard S Rivlin, Alan H Pressman and Robert Giller comment; drawing (M)
